## Source: ossf-package-analysis (4284a36a7752369b443a4416665fd7d5f1fbf10865890023e8acf53f096f045e)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '0x-smart-contracts' @ 99.99.99 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
